name: Hardest 3.23 "The Bartender's Tale" Trivia Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 3 | 10 Questions

questions.text: How much did Carla say she made a week with her tips?
questions.explanation:
$500.

	A waitress does not make a lot of money from their paycheck. Most of their money is made in tips. Carla did her job well and brought in about $500 a week.

questions.text: Why didn't Carla like the waitresses that Sam picked?
questions.correct: Sam wanted to sleep with them.
options: She didn't like how they dressed.
questions.explanation:
Sam wanted to sleep with them.

	Carla said that every waitress Sam picked out he slept with and then when they broke up she was left alone at the bar again. Sam agreed to let Carla help choose the next waitress he hired.

questions.text: Who did Carla pick as the next waitress?
questions.explanation:
Lilian Huxley.

	Lilian Huxley was played by Lila Kaye. She was born in England in 1929 and died in 2012 also in England.

questions.text: Who did Carla send the new waitress' name to?
questions.explanation:
Diane.

	Carla wanted Diane to know she had been replaced. Carla's happiest day is the day that Diane left Cheers.

questions.text: How much did Frasier tip the bellboy?
questions.explanation:
2000 lire.

	At the time this show aired, Diane said that 2000 lire was equal to $100 US dollars. Frasier thought he only tipped a little bit.

Cliff.

	Cliff's mail load was too heavy due to two major catalogs coming out on the same day. He said it's a phenomenon that only happens once every 20 years.

questions.text: Who did Sam want to date?
questions.explanation:
Caroline.

	Caroline was Lilian's daughter. When Sam asked Lilian about asking Caroline out, Lilian thought he wanted to go out with her.

Carla.

	Carla was afraid that if Sam broke up with Caroline, Lillian would get upset and quit. She was not going though another waitress because of Sam so she threatened to quit if Sam asked Caroline out.

questions.text: When Sam said, "What would Diane do?" how did Carla respond?
questions.explanation:
"Talk till we puke."

	Carla never missed a chance to show her dislike of Diane. This time Diane was not even present in the bar, but that didn't stop Carla.

questions.text: What didn't the new waitress's daughter like?
questions.explanation:
sex.

	Caroline said her mother's husbands all died while having sex. She said because of that she absolutely hated sex.
